citations.narrative:
Sharp points were found in the enclosure containing a Blue and Gold Macaw. There was a wooden (2 by 4) perch that
was broken leaving the entire metal support (joists) exposed. Another joist had pulled away from the wooden perched
exposing the sharp metal edge. The macaw was free in the enclosure with access to the sharp points. The primary
enclosure must be constructed and maintained so that they have no sharp points that could potentially injure the birds.
Correct by: 11/18/2024

The Great horned owl enclosure, the Barn Owl Enclosure, and the Ferruginous Hawk enclosure had walls with exposed
damaged plywood and/or particleboard that was not able to be effectively cleaned and sanitized. Primary enclosures must
be constructed and maintained so that all surfaces in contact with the birds may be readily cleaned and/or sanitized in
accordance with 3.158 or be replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by: 11/23/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(i)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
Sharp points were found in the enclosure containing a Blue and Gold Macaw. There was a wooden (2 by 4) perch that 
was broken leaving the entire metal support (joists) exposed. Another joist had pulled away from the wooden perched 
exposing the sharp metal edge. The macaw was free in the enclosure with access to the sharp points. The primary 
enclosure must be constructed and maintained so that they have no sharp points that could potentially injure the birds.  
Correct by: 11/18/2024 
3.153(a)(1)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The Great horned owl enclosure, the Barn Owl Enclosure, and the Ferruginous Hawk enclosure had walls with exposed 
damaged plywood and/or particleboard that was not able to be effectively cleaned and sanitized. Primary enclosures must 
be constructed and maintained so that all surfaces in contact with the birds may be readily cleaned and/or sanitized in 
accordance with 3.158 or be replaced when worn or soiled. 
Correct by: 11/23/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
